CustomField.description: This field determines whether approval requests are sent one at a time or all at once. If checked, they go out one at a time in the order: first approver, process approvers (by process id), impacted process approvers (by id), customization approvers (by id), impacted customization approvers (by id), executive approver, last approver. Approvals stop when all approvals received or rejection is received.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field determines whether approval requests are sent one at a time or all at once.
CustomField.label: Sequential Approval Requests
